titleStmt.title: An exposition with practicall observations continued upon the fifteenth, sixteenth, and seventeenth chapters of the book of Job being the summe of twenty three lectures delivered at Magnus neer the bridge, London / by Joseph Caryl.
titleStmt.author: Caryl, Joseph, 1602-1673.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Matthew Simmons, and are to be sould by Thomas Eglesfeild ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bristol Public Library, Bristol, England.
